statement.p: Below is a map of Central New Jersey. Using an inch ruler on the map, you found the distance between Rutgers University Cook-Douglas Campus and Robinvale is \displaystyle{2}\frac{{7}}{{16}} inches. Find the actual distance between Rutgers University Cook-Douglas Campus and Robinvale.
The actual distance between Rutgers University Cook-Douglas Campus and Robinvale is miles.
